results.title: On the Town
results.creator_credit: Gene Kelly, Stanley Donen, Arthur Freed, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: A great musical comedy which is given full treatment with fine singing and dancing. It is the story of three sailors and their girls. Starring Gene Kelly, Ann Miller and Frank Sinatra.

results.title: Ben Hur
results.creator_credit: William Wyler, Sam Zimbalist, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, United Artists Corporation and Ken Adam
results.brief_description: Winner of 11 Academy Awards. A first-rate biblical epic packed with action. The chariot race is an all-time achievement in film editing and one of the greatest action scenes in motion pictures. Stars Charlton Heston as Ben Hur. Based on the novel by Lew Wallace.
results.creator_credit_for_label: William Wyler, Sam Zimbalist, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, United Artists Corporation and Ken Adam

results.title: Kiss me Kate
results.creator_credit: George Sidney, Jack Cummings and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Kiss me Kate, one of the most celebrated musicals, with its sparkling songs and dazzling wit, stars Kathryn Grayson and Howard Keel at their best, in the battle of the sexes. Kathryn is Lilli Vanessi, the temperamental stage star, Howard is her ex-husband Fred Graham. The action takes place on an opening night with a romantic free-for-all in the dressing rooms and on stage. Unforgettable songs in Cole Porter’s vibrant score and dancing by Ann Miller. Based on the play by Samuel and Bella Spewack.

results.title: La Cage Aux Folles [Dubbed]
results.creator_credit: Edouard Molinaro, Marcello Danon, Da Ma Produzione and Productions Artistes Associes
results.brief_description: La Cage aux Folles is the name of a transvestite nightclub run by a pair of aging homosexuals, one of whom has a son eager to be married. However his fiancee’s father is the chief of a political party dedicated to morality who is not likely to approve of his new in-laws. A touching and sensitive comedy that proves love has no boundaries. Based on the play by Jean Poiret. Screenplay by Francis Verber. Cast includes Michelle Serrault, Ugo Tognazzi and Michel Galabru. In French with English subtitles.

results.title: Top Hat
results.creator_credit: Mark Sandrich, Pandro S. Berman and RKO Radio Pictures
results.brief_description: One of the best musicals by the Fred Astaire-Ginger Rogers team. The featured songs are “Fancy Free”, sung and danced by Fred in his hotel suite as a way to bring him face to face with Ginger; “Isn’t this a lovely city?” which is sung and danced on a bandstand in a London park; “Top hat, white tie and tails” featuring Fred and the chorus in an exciting number; the unforgettable “Cheek to cheek”; and the lavishly staged finale, “The Piccolino”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mark Sandrich, Pandro S. Berman and RKO Radio Pictures

results.title: An American in Paris
results.creator_credit: Vincente Minnelli, Adrienne Fazan, Arthur Freed, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: An American in Paris tells the story of an ex-GI art student who has fallen in love with a young French girl and then sadly has been parted from her. At their separation he reflects on his feelings towards Paris - the frustration’s, joys and miseries that have been part of his life and his falling in love. Gene Kelly teams up with Leslie Caron in this spectacularly staged musical featuring songs by George and Ira Gershwin. Academy Award for Best Film 1951.

results.title: High society
results.creator_credit: Charles Walters, Sol Siegel, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: Bing Crosby, Grace Kelly and Frank Sinatra romp elegantly through the scenic, moneyed grounds and waters of outwardly elitist Newport, Rhode Island in this hip, witty, musical version of Philip Barry’s “The Philadelphia story”. Legendary Louis Armstrong, as himself, plays his trumpet and narrates in prose and song the peccadillos of his song-writer friend C. K. Dexter-Haven as he tries to win back his haughty ex-wife on the eve of her marriage. Music by Cole Porter.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Charles Walters, Sol Siegel, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists Corporation

results.title: Doctor Zhivago
results.creator_credit: David Lean, Carlo Ponti, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: Doctor Zhivago is a moving story of love and romance told against the flaming background of the Russian Revolution. The story is presented through many characters whose destinies are interwoven. Not only is it a vast panorama of a country undergoing the most radical revolution in history; it also probes, with deep and desperate concern, the personal struggle of one man’s survival. The film stars Omar Sharif and Julie Christie. A poet, a surgeon, a husband and a lover - this is the story of Zhivago. Based on the novel by Boris Pasternak.
results.creator_credit_for_label: David Lean, Carlo Ponti, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and United Artists Corporation

results.title: Pat and Mike
results.creator_credit: George Cukor, Lawrence Weingarten and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Spencer Tracy and Katharine Hepburn are sparring partners in this punchy comedy, of two good sports who stage a never ending romantic battle. Katharine Hepburn plays “Pat”, an all-round woman athlete who is a whiz at golf, tennis, baseball, basketball, boxing, archery and Judo. Spencer Tracy superbly enacts the part of “Mike”, an unschooled, rough-mannered Broadway promoter who already has a racing horse, and a heavy-weight fighter (Aldo Ray) as “clients” and who, possessing the top horse is now determined to have the “top woman”.

results.title: High noon
results.creator_credit: Fred Zimmerman, Stanley Kramer and United Artists Corporation
results.brief_description: A retired marshal is forced to take up his badge and guns again when a killer he has sent to jail returns to town, looking for revenge. The townspeople refuse to help and his new bride wants him to run away from the fight. The marshal meets the killer and his three accomplices at high noon in one of the most suspenseful and thrilling gunfights ever filmed. Starring Gary Cooper and Grace Kelly. Based on the story, “The Tin star”, by John W. Cunningham.
